centre.desc: Center a window on the screen, with optional nudge or animation.

help.desc: Lists all available commands, or details for a specific command.

install.desc: When you drag new extensions in, run this to rebuild the manifest

nudge.desc: Smooth queued nudge with diagonal support.

resize.desc: Resize windows smoothly by side, axis, or all sides equally.

select.desc: Select a window by fuzzy title match.

update.desc: Checks for and applies incremental updates from api.phi.me.uk
